comments:
Using the GTK M5 build.

While typing away in an editor (entering Java code) the whole program
crashed/disappeared.  Below is the last 150 lines from the log file, although
the last item seemed to be a minute or two before this happened.

Otherwise there is little to report about what I was doing.
